summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Two Thousand Two Hundred Fifty-two and 16/100 ($2,252.16) Dollars, or so much thereof as may be necessary from the General Fund of the City of Seattle, for the purpose of paying the City's portion of the cost of the improvement of Eighth Avenue et al, by paving the same, under Ordinance No. 18472, creating Local Improvement District No. 1740.
